name: Giantex 40 lbs Patio Umbrella Base, 21.5" Round Market Umbrella Stand for 1.5''-1.9'' Umbrella Poles, Heavy Duty Resin Base with Metal Support Holder for Deck Garden Poolside (40 lbs)
short_description: 【Heavy Duty Resin Base】: Crafted with premium-quality resin and a powder-coated metal pole, this umbrella stand is built to withstand prolonged outdoor use with its exceptional durability, waterproofing, wind resistance, and stability. 【Fits Most Umbrellas】: Featuring 2 plastic adapters, this outdoor umbrella base stand is designed to accommodate patio umbrellas with pole diameters ranging from 1.5''-1.9'' for maximum versatility. It can securely hold almost all market umbrellas up to 9 ft in size. 【Adjustable Rotary Knob】: Featuring an adjustable knob, this umbrella base ensures a secure and stable fit for your umbrella pole, providing additional support to prevent any wobbling. We highly recommend using this base in combination with a patio table for optimal stability and safety. 【Easy to Assemble】: Setting up the weighted umbrella base is a breeze with just 3 simple steps. First, install the support pole, then select the suitable plastic adapter, and finally adjust the fixed knob for optimal stability. 【Multifunctional Umbrella Base】: Featuring a sleek and stylish retro pattern, this black umbrella base adds a touch of sophistication to your outdoor space. Suitable for use in courtyards, gardens, balconies, lawns, and more, it provides the perfect base for your outdoor umbrella while enhancing your decor.

name: Steel Plate Umbrella Base, 36 lbs, Black
short_description: One solid A grade high durability steel plate it won't crack or break Low profile base less than 1" thickness so people don't trip on it 20" * 20" square size to increase the base stability. Base weight 36 lbs. Tube can fit 1 3/8", 1 1/2", 1 3/4" umbrella poles Black powder coating finish. HQ base Made in Taiwan.Search " tropishade " for a compatible umbrella
product_description: Use this versatile TropiShade steel umbrella base to keep your patio umbrella firmly in place. This heavy duty square umbrella base has a weather-resistant design, so you can keep it outdoors all year round. It can fit most of outdoor furniture's because it's less than 1" thickness and fit under table easily. The unit's screw mechanism keeps your umbrella securely attached to the base even in a windy conditions. Fit all kinds of umbrellas including tropishade umbrellas.

name: C-Hopetree 40 lb Heavy Duty Round Base Stand for Outdoor Patio Market Table Umbrella, Bronze
short_description: High quality: durable resin concrete composite provides the best weather and sun protection outside Design: antique cast iron look with art deco pattern adding extra charm and elegance Versatile: adjustable holder to fit 1.5" (38mm) and 1.9"(48mm) diameter poles Widely used: suits 7-11 feet market umbrellas through a table or freestanding for porch and yard Double-lock design: 1 adjustable rotary knobs for securing the umbrella to the base

name: 30 Pound Black Powder Coated Cast Iron Umbrella Stand
short_description: Cast iron umbrella base weight 30 pounds with a black powder coating 20 inches in diameter Euro Deco styled pattern One pole thumb screws secure umbrella in base Base tube is compatible with 1 3/8" and 1 1/2" umbrella poles Search " tropishade " for a compatible umbrella
product_description: Enjoy outdoor lifestyle with this attractive Black umbrella base. At 30 lbs. This umbrella stand is great for most applications. Simple & easy to use this universal umbrella stand will fit 1 3/8" & 1 1/2" umbrella poles. Cast iron & powder coating protect it from the elements. This umbrella base is strong & sturdy.

name: Trademark Innovations 17.7" Diameter Cast Iron Umbrella Base (Black Finish)
short_description: Measures 17.5" in diameter and 14" high Made of sturdy cast iron Fits 1" (using the included plastic insert) or 2" diameter pole Weighs 22.5 pounds By Trademark Innovations
product_description: This attractive cast iron umbrella base is sure to secure your umbrella to your deck or patio. It measures 17.5" in diameter and weighs 22.5 pounds. It will fit 1" (using the included plastic insert) or 2" diameter pole. By Trademark Innovations.

name: HealSmart 24.2 lbs Heavy Duty Umbrella Base 17.72" Round Patio Umbrellas-Stand for Outdoor, Lawn and Garden, Bronze
short_description: Resin Material: The umbrella base is crafted from durable resin, boasting waterproof, aging, wear and rust resistance. It is good at keeping shape, reducing the risk of chipping or breakage, while securely supporting your umbrellas. Adjustable Design: Featuring a hand-turn tightening knob and fitting for 1.49"(38mm) and 1.89"(48mm) diameter poles. you can adjust it by your umbrella's thickness, to secure your umbrella in the base stably. Vintage Appearance: Antique cast iron exterior coupled with bronzed art deco patterns adds charm and elegance to your patio umbrella. It also adds a beautiful view to your garden while you enjoy the sunshade brought by the umbrella. Easy Assembly: Simply insert the umbrella pole with appropriate size into the base and tighten the knobs, also secure the umbrella by tightening the bottom screw and spacers. Wide Application: The umbrella base is essential to market patio umbrellas. Versatile base is ideal for gardens, patios, terraces, resorts, water parks, balconies, barbecue bars and more.
product_description: HealSmart 24.2 lbs Heavy Duty Umbrella Base 17.72" Round Patio Umbrella Stand for Outdoor, Lawn and Garden, Bronze

name: Sunnyglade 18" 30.2-lbs Heavy Duty Round Antiqued Umbrella Base for Patio, Outdoor - Bronze
short_description: Material : Made from Resin material avoids breakage and paint detachment of the umbrella base Design : With an attractive decorative pattern and bronze finish this piece adds charm and elegance High Quality : Rigorously tested for durability and assembly instructions have been standardized Knob : Includes a hand-turn knob for securing umbrella to the base to sustain the umbrella Package Includes : 1*umbrella base, 2 couplers to allow it to fit both 1.38" And 1.8" diameter poles

name: 28 lbs Square Heavy-Duty Steel Plate Umbrella Base Stand for 1.5“ or 1.9” Poles, for Outdoor, Lawn, Deck, Poolside & Patio Umbrella Stands
short_description: HIGH QUALITY: Heavy-duty steel structure with ageing, wear, and rust resistance. Waterproof design ensures durability. Easy to install, maintain, and service, providing a strong and durable base for your market courtyard outdoor umbrella. GOOD SAFETY PERFORMANCE: The square umbrella base features a moderate thickness, providing sufficient weight for stability while ensuring customer safety by minimizing tripping hazards. HOLDS ALL SIZES OF UMBRELLAS: The versatile steel tubing base accommodates most umbrellas on the market, including those ranging from 6-10 feet with pole diameters of 1.5-1.9 inches. ELEGANT DESIGN: Overall size: 17.3" (L) x 17.3" (W) x 14.5" (H); Weight: 28 lbs. The square design is classic and elegant, making it suitable for any outdoor space. APPLICATION SCENARIO: This square umbrella base features a sleek, elegant design suitable for home, garden, swimming pool, company lounge, and various residential and commercial settings. It is an ideal choice for leisure shading.

name: Yaheetech 55lbs Heavy Duty Round Umbrella Base with 4 Lockable Rolling Wheels & 2 knobs, Outdoor Antiqued Umbrella Stand, 20” Market Patio Umbrella Base for Garden, Yard, Lawn Bronze
short_description: 55 lb Umbrella Base Stand: This umbrella base stand is built from all-weather resin and strong iron for enhanced durability. Weighing a solid 55 lb, it ensures superior stability, making it ideal for large -sized outdoor umbrellas and able to withstand the elements for long-lasting outdoor use Market Standard Base: This rolling patio umbrella base stand is equipped with rubber adapters that fit the market standard umbrella pole diameter3.8 cm/ 1.5’’, 4.8 cm/ 1.9’’, 5.7 cm/ 2.2’’. It offers versatility, fitting most patio umbrellas for added convenience Four Lockable Wheels: This 55 lb outdoor parasol base features four smooth industrial castors for effortless mobility. Once positioned, you can lock castors to ensure the base stays securely in place, preventing unwanted movement while keeping your umbrella steady Broad Base: Featuring a 20-inch diameter, this outdoor umbrella base provides superior stability. Its broad design offers a secure foundation, keeping your market umbrella steady, even in breezy conditions. Thumb Screw: Two rotary knobs are provided on the side of the center pole to settle the patio umbrella on this base stand, by simply turning the knob left and right, the patio umbrella can be fixed or detached from this outdoor umbrella base stand

Further prevent your umbrellas from falling down. 【Pole Adjustable in Diameter】The pole of this patio umbrella stand is adjustable in diameter from φ1.5" - 1.9". Plenty umbrellas with various size can match our base. Much convenient. 【Highly Durability】This umbrella base is made of premium quality material to reinforce its structure. High density resin base is good at keeping shape, not easy to be chipped off or broken. It can hold your beautiful umbrellas well. 【Outdoor Use】 The umbrella base can be used on plenty of occasions.
